content.description: Start on good holds of the back wall. Place a heel and work up through pockets and slopers to the top.
content.location: Right side of Puzzle box roof, shares the same finish as Chandler dub.

content.description: Climb R God into the headwall of Cosmic and Crossjoint, traverse and finish on Pufferfish. Beta intensive, lots of trickery.
content.location: Start on R God on the left side of the wall.

content.description: Begin on the left hand pinch and right hand sloper of Missionary Position. Pull on and traverse through the Hermit to exit on Cosmic Tricycle. Some huge moves, a crucial right toe cam, and some serious body tension will get you to the end of Cosmic. Excellent and unusual movement on good holds makes this one of the most enjoyable problems at the Draw that not many people do.
content.protection: Several pads, and a spotter makes this feel comfortable, but like everything at the Draw, once you dial the moves, a pad over the crux is all you need.
content.location: The left side of the Puzzle Box roof.

content.description: Exceptional, and popular. Start at the skirt and reach left to a sloping hueco. Jump to a round hold, then climb the headwall past a loaf and the puffer fish hold. Rock over and enjoy.
content.location: Near the middle of the roof. Shares a start with Cosmic Tricycle.

content.description: Climb Pink Lightening then finish out Chandler Dub Allstars. Long and difficult
Climb R God to the big cross, then reverse cosmic tricycle finishing out pufferfish. Long and tiring. This roof is good all year, except for untimely seepage after snow melt or rain.
Head straight out the belly feature at the left end of the roof, starting at opposing poor sidepulls. Extreme heelhook action!
content.location: Near the left end of the roof, just left of a line of big pockets.

content.description: Climb Cosmic Tricycle to the good left hand hueco at the end, match the hueco and move left topping out via the hermit.
Short but high-quality: begin at a sloping gaston (tricky beta) and climb straight out the roof through a flat pocket and a hueco with a thumb hole.
content.location: Left end of the roof, just right of Missionary Position

content.description: Climb R God but instead of topping out, continue right through  the headwall into the ending pinches of pufferfish, then finish out via Chandler Dub Allstars. Lots of footwork trickery and endurance.

Shares a start with Puffer Fish on the bulging skirt near the middle of the roof. From the skirt, reach both hands out to the rail of sloping huecos and head left to a big slopey undercling. Move to the double round pockets and finish out the steep nose. Seriously entertaining movement on flawless rock. [significantly easier with kneepad] 

  Variations: Cosmic Bicycle (V8) starts matched at the sloping undercling and finishes out the nose. Huffelupagus (V10) climbs Cosmic Tricycle to the two round pockets, then continues heading left to join the large sloping hueco at the end of The Hermit.
content.protection: A few pads and spotters, particularly for the ending which has a poor landing.
content.location: Start near the middle of the roof at the obvious bulging skirt (same as Puffer Fish) and head left.

content.description: This is a variation of Cosmic Tri-cycle and incorporates most of the problem. The climb starts on the under cling and you can either toe down to the left with foot up and right or set a knee bar between your hands on the start. The climb moves to climbers right and requires strong foot work. After grabbing pockets to right your feet move back towards start hold to set a heel and toe lock. Video can be found on youtube.
content.protection: Need 3 to 4 pads and spotters are necessary.
content.location: In Priest Draw on Puzzle Box Boulder. This is located just to the left of the parking area (if facing Priest Draw). Short approach up trail.

content.description: Climb the first few moves of pufferfish, establish the pinches and bust right to a deep two finger pocket, and finish right above more pinches. a bit painful at first.
content.protection:
2-3 crash pads 

vimeo.com/35184572

  3rd problem in video.

content.description: The Puzzle Box is a wide faceted roof, horizontal at its base with a short headwall. Many problems and linkups exist including area standards Puffer Fish and Cosmic Tricycle. Rock is generally superb with some very cool huecos and slopers. Caution: this roof has a sloping, uneven landing zone and some dirty topouts.
